resources.string: Automatically sort your photos to date related subdirectories, based on timestamp encoded in filenames
Press SORT to sort your photos or REVERT to move them back to base directory.
Press BACKUP to copy and sort your photos or REVERT to backup and flatten them.
No camera folder selected. Go to Paths view!
No destination folder for backup selected. Go to Paths view!
ERROR: Destination must not overlap source path!
External storage write access denied. Hence, it cannot function properly. Please consider granting this permission!
Directory write access denied in File mode. Switch to SAF mode or choose different directory!
The destination folder is optional. Select one, if you want to move the photos outside of the camera folder or if you want to manage a backup copy.
